description: Lily of the Incas (Alstroemeria 'Sweet Laura') is an amazing plant that can bring beauty to your garden. It boasts a rainbow of colors such as red, yellow, and orange, and its trumpet-like flowers have a delicate and pleasant scent. The Sweet Laura variety also lasts longer than other alstroemerias, making it a great choice for an extended floral display. To top it off, its care is quite easy; all it needs is a little pruning and some protection from cold temperatures. If you're looking for an exotic, low-maintenance flower for your garden, the Lily of the Incas is definitely the way to go!
